b0a90be919a9f920bb8ad2caca4e91f0 (02:02): mod_cband is an Apache 2 module that solves the problem of limiting the bandwidth usage of users, virtual hosts, and destinations. or http://dembol.nasa.pl/mod_cband or http://cband.linux.pl/

e4d7ac934a5608807fe9130e93a22a50 (02:03): well you need to put it back in. without a directory block with an allowoverride line, your htaccess file will never be read
